donate.intro: Your donations help us continue our pastoral-missionary work, restore and maintain holy places, support social-philanthropic programs and provide support to parish communities throughout the diocese.

causes.title: How donations are used
causes.restorationText: Restoration and preservation of historical monuments and churches in the diocese, including paintings, iconostases and architectural elements.
causes.socialText: Programs to help needy families, lonely elderly, orphans and people in difficulty.
causes.educationText: Supporting religious education programs for children, youth and adults, as well as continuing clergy formation.
causes.missionText: Supporting pastoral-missionary activities, religious publications and evangelization programs.

methods.title: Donation Methods
methods.bankNote: Please mention in "Payment details" the purpose of the donation (e.g. "Church restoration", "Social assistance", etc.)
methods.onlineText: You can donate online by bank card using the secure payment platform.
methods.personText: You can donate directly at the Metropolis headquarters during working hours.

tax.title: Tax Deduction
tax.text: According to current legislation, donations to religious institutions are tax deductible up to 5% of annual income. Upon request, we can issue the necessary documents for tax deduction.
tax.contact: For more information, contact the Metropolitan Chancellery at cancelarie@mitropolia-targovistei.ro

thanks.title: Thank you for your generosity!
thanks.text: Every donation, regardless of size, is received with gratitude and is used in service to the community and the Church. May God reward you!
